# Summary

In summary, there are a lot of things to consider. However, we hope that this playbook will help you to plan ahead and decrease the chances for disappointment and drama. Some of our key messasges are:

- know your audience;
- know the parameters that you can work with;
- reach out for help;
- learn from desasters.

This is a living document. Please make sure to stay in touch with us and help us to make this playbook more suitable for you.
